sentences.sContent: Thenardier noted the enormous size of the cudgel and the solitude of the spot.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thenardier noted the enormous size of the cudgel and the solitude of the spot.
sentences.sCn: 德纳第望着那根粗壮无比的棍棒和那一片荒凉的地方。

sentences.sContent: He took Cosette by his left hand, and with his right he picked up his cudgel, which was lying on the ground.
sentences.sContent_eng: He took Cosette by his left hand, and with his right he picked up his cudgel, which was lying on the ground.
sentences.sCn: 他用左手牵着珂赛特，用右手从地上拾起他的那根棍棒。

trans.tranOther: a short thick stick used as a weapon
